faqs.question: Is DIIT affiliated with the National University?
faqs.answer: Yes, Daffodil Institute of Information Technology (DIIT) is affiliated with the National University of Bangladesh. We offer professional Honours programs including BBA, CSE, and BTHM.

faqs.question: What are the admission requirements for the CSE program?
faqs.answer: For the B.Sc. in Computer Science & Engineering (CSE), candidates must have passed HSC or equivalent with Physics and Mathematics. A minimum GPA as prescribed by the National University is required.

faqs.question: How do I apply for admission?
faqs.answer: You can apply online through our website or visit our campus admissions office. You will need to submit your academic transcripts, photos, and other relevant documents.

faqs.question: Does DIIT offer any scholarship facilities?
faqs.answer: Yes, DIIT offers merit-based scholarships for students with excellent academic results in SSC and HSC. We also have financial aid options for deserving students.

faqs.question: What are the tuition fees for the BBA program?
faqs.answer: Tuition fees vary by program and semester. Please contact our admissions office or download the latest fee structure brochure from the Admissions page for detailed information.

faqs.question: Do you provide internship opportunities?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. DIIT has a dedicated Career Placement Cell that helps students secure internships and jobs. We have partnerships with various IT firms and corporate houses.

faqs.question: Are the computer labs accessible to students after class hours?
faqs.answer: Yes, our computer labs are open for students to practice and complete assignments. Lab supervision is available during designated hours.

faqs.question: Is there a library on campus?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have a well-stocked library with physical books, journals, and a digital section for research. It is a quiet zone for study and preparation.

faqs.question: Does DIIT provide transport facilities?
faqs.answer: We do not have a dedicated bus service, but our campus is centrally located in Dhaka with excellent connectivity via public transport.

faqs.question: What extra-curricular activities are available?
faqs.answer: Students can join various clubs such as the Computer Club, Business Club, Cultural Club, and Sports Club. We regularly organize fests, programming contests, and cultural programs.
